list.title: fetch-utils
list.description:
Fetch Utlities module
Provides helper methods for making backend calls using the Fetch API

list.title: badGatewayError
list.description: Bad Gateway Error

list.title: badRequestError
list.description: Bad Request Error

list.title: convertColorToHex
list.description: Use to get the Hex format of a provided color.

list.title: convertColorToHSL
list.description: Use to get the HSL format of a provided color.

list.title: convertColorToRGB
list.description: Use to get the RGB format of a provided color.

list.title: convertColorToRGBA
list.description: Use to convert hex value that need alpha transperancy to RGBA

list.title: evaluateColorCompatibilities
list.description: Evaluate a list of colors against a source color

list.title: fixHexMissingHash
list.description: Used to check for missing hex on value provided

list.title: FlagContainer
list.description: FlatContainer shows or hides child components depending on flags configuration and overrides

list.title: forbiddenError
list.description: Forbidden Error

list.title: gatewayTimeoutError
list.description: Gateway Timeout Error

list.title: genColorsData
list.description:
Use to generate color data for provided hex and returns
base color data, variant colors and compatibility results.

list.title: generateErrorResponse
list.description: Generate an error response

list.title: getColorAndVariantCorrelationsData
list.description:
Use to evalute a base color as well as
a list of options against each other

list.title: getColorContrastRatio
list.description: Use to get contrast ratio between 2 colors.

list.title: getColorCorrelationsData
list.description: Use to evaluate a base color against a list of options.

list.title: getColorSeedData
list.description: Use to get foundation data for a color.

list.title: getColorVariantsSeedData
list.description: Use to get foundation data for an array of color variants for a given base color.

list.title: getFlagFromQueryParams
list.description: Checks URL query 'flags' parameter and finds overrides for requested flag

list.title: getIsReadable
list.description:
Use to determine if colors have sufficient text
foreground/background contrast.

list.title: getIsValidNonTextContrast
list.description:
Use to determine if colors have sufficient non-text
foreground/background contrast.

list.title: getLanguage
list.description: Get currently selected language or default language

list.title: getLightnessArray
list.description:
Use to generate an array of numbers used to seed the
lightness of variant colors.

list.title: getThemeAPIKeysFromNames
list.description:
This is used to create api key constants that
convert constant names using Underscore notation to
API key dot notation.

list.title: getTranslation
list.description: Get translated string for the given key and options

list.title: getTranslations
list.description: Get array of tranlated strings for given array of keys with or without options

list.title: getUserFriendlyRatio
list.description: Get a user-friendly contrast ratio to display to end users.

list.title: HIDE
list.description: HIDE flag is to indicate that the flag is off and the component should be hidden

list.title: initMirageServer
list.description: Initialize a Mirage JS server instance. See https://miragejs.com/docs/getting-started/overview/ for more information.

list.title: initTranslations
list.description: Initialize translation

list.title: internalServerError
list.description: Internal Server Error

list.title: isFlagEnabled
list.description: Check is flag is set to SHOW and does not have HIDE override

list.title: isValidHexColor
list.description: Used to validate hex

list.title: notAuthorizedError
list.description: Not Authorized Error

list.title: notFoundError
list.description: Not Found Error

list.title: requestTimeoutError
list.description: Request Timeout Error

list.title: resetFlags
list.description: Reset internal flags cache

list.title: serviceUnavailableError
list.description: Service Unavailable Error

list.title: setLanguage
list.description: Set new language

list.title: SHOW
list.description: SHOW flag is to indicate that the flag is on and the component should be displayed

list.title: tooManyRequestsError
list.description: Too Many Requests Error

list.title: updateFlags
list.description: Update internal flags cache.

list.title: useTranslation
list.description: useTranslation hook for functional components

list.title: validateCharacterCount
list.description: Validate a string has a specific amount of characters

list.title: validateEqualValues
list.description: Validate a passed set of values are all the same

list.title: validateRequiredField
list.description: Validate a single value representing a required field is non-empty

list.title: validateRequiredFields
list.description: Validate multiple passed values representing required fields are non-empty

list.title: withFlags
list.description: HOC to load flags per page
